name: Everfly
description:
Everfly is a minimalist puzzle-arcade game set in a world of numbers. Guide the Everfly across the vast universe of numbers and progress through eight different levels.

Every direction has a number which moves them exactly that number of steps, and they cannot revisit the same place.

This is a game originally developed in January 2017 as a college project for BINUS University International's Data Structures course, now updated for minor gameplay changes and bug fixes.

BLOG: https://everflygame.wordpress.com/

Features
  • Classic ASCII gameplay which combines both mind-bending puzzles and risk-taking decisions.
  • Eight unique and carefully designed levels to test your wits to their limit.
  • A high-score system to compete with friends and families.
Instructions
  • Press [WASD] or arrow keys to move.
  • Press [Space] to wait for enemies.
  • Press [R] to restart level if you are stuck.
  • Press [Q] to return to main menu.

Everfly © 2017 Karuna. All rights reserved.
